entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 later this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
